text: SO many questions. And a belief that it will take years to make it stable. So much windows (and app) code that says If( protocol == Kerb ) Dothis(); Else Dothat(); Is suddenly going to have to get much more complicated. The blog post says it’ll happen in Win11. That I don’t believe at all… “Reducing the use of NTLM will ultimately culminate in it being disabled in Windows 11. “ Win12/Win14/etc… seems much more likely. %40smithcons.com

metadata.topic: RE: NTLM - prepare for it's demise
